searchDocs.content: </> GranularPermissions.new() → GranularPermissions-- Returns the GranularPermissions instance. Creates a new GranularPermissions instance.

searchDocs.title: IsAuthorised​
searchDocs.content: </> GranularPermissions:IsAuthorised( Player: Player ,-- The player whose permissions are being checked Permissions: {any}-- A list of permissions to evaluate ) → boolean-- Returns true if the player is authorized, otherwise false This function checks if a player is authorized based on a given set of permissions.

searchDocs.title: GetCallback​
searchDocs.content: </> GranularPermissions:GetCallback( Callback: string,-- The name of the callback to execute ...: any-- Additional arguments to pass to the callback ) → boolean?-- Returns the result of the callback, or nil if the callback is not found This function retrieves and executes a registered callback for the provided arguments.

searchDocs.title: RegisterReplacement​
searchDocs.content: </> GranularPermissions:RegisterReplacement( ReplacementName: string,-- The name of the replacement ReplaceWith: string | number-- The value to replace with ) → () This function registers a single replacement for use in permission strings.

searchDocs.title: RegisterReplacementsBulk​
searchDocs.content: </> GranularPermissions:RegisterReplacementsBulk( Replacements: {{ ReplacementName: string, ReplaceWith: string | number }}-- A list of replacements to register ) → boolean-- Returns true after successfully registering all replacements This function registers multiple replacements in bulk.

searchDocs.title: RegisterCallback​
searchDocs.content: </> GranularPermissions:RegisterCallback( CallbackName: string,-- The name of the callback Callback: ( self: GranularPermissions, ...any ) → boolean-- The function to execute for the callback ) → boolean-- Returns true if the callback was registered, or false if it already exists This function registers a callback function to evaluate permissions dynamically.
